MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-DEC-2020 10:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PA13 postcode area of Kilmacolm. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and became aware of this at 01.18am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:02am on Wednesday, 09 December 2020
